proglet.synthesons
Class NotesSoundBit

java.lang.Object
  org.javascool.SoundBit
      proglet.synthesons.NotesSoundBit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Widget
public class NotesSoundBit
extends SoundBit

Creates a monophonic ``piccolo´´ sound-bit from a note sequence (still in development).

The sound-bit can be changed using the reset(notes) method.

See Also:

Method Detail

get

public double get(char channel,
                  double time)
Description copied from class: SoundBit
Defines the sound function.
One get() methods i to be overloaded to define your own sound.
By contract this method is called for index = 0, 1, 2, .. in consecutive increasing order.

Overrides:
get in class SoundBit
Parameters:
channel - Left 'l' or right 'r' channel.
time - Sound time in second.
Returns:
The sound value between -1.0 and 1.0 (maximal amplitude, linear scale).

getStream

public AudioInputStream getStream()
Description copied from class: SoundBit
Returns the 16 bit, stereo, sound bit, PCM standard, signed PCM, 44.1 KHz sampled, audio stream, supporting mark and reset.
- Notice: this stream is never closed, but can be reset when to be reused.

Overrides:
getStream in class SoundBit
Returns:
A new javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream corresponding to this sound.

reset

public SoundBit reset(String notes)
Constructs a sound defined from a note sequence.

Overrides:
reset in class SoundBit
Parameters:
notes - The note sequence.
Returns:
This, allowing to use the SoundBit pml= new SoundBit().reset(..) construct.
